name: coderabbit-storage-mysql
title: CodeRabbit MySQL Storage
description: MySQL database adapter with connection pooling and optimized indexes. Includes complete SQL schema for MySQL 5.7+ and MySQL 8+. Works with all MySQL providers: PlanetScale, AWS RDS, Google Cloud SQL, Azure Database for MySQL, and MariaDB.
docs: Create a MySQL connection pool using mysql2/promise and pass it to MySQLStorageAdapter. Run the SQL schema from the adapter file to create the coderabbit_reports table. Call adapter.close() when shutting down to properly close connections.
